jobListings.title: Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using modern tech stacks
Build and integrate APIs and smart contract functionality
Ensure responsive design and cross-platform optimization
Collaborate with UI/UX designers, QA, and blockchain teams
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Perform code reviews and troubleshoot issues
Work in agile sprints and participate in daily standups
skills: 3+ years of full-stack development experience
Proficiency in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express, Next.js, PostgreSQL
Experience with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Version control (Git) and CI/CD pipeline knowledge
Bonus: Solidity, Web3.js, TypeScript, Nest.js, blockchain experience
bonus: Built crypto wallets, NFT platforms, or ICO dashboards
Familiarity with container tools (Docker, Kubernetes)
Contributions to open-source Web3 projects
expert: Developed scalable web apps from scratch
Deep understanding of modern frameworks, databases, and APIs
Experience in smart contract integration and blockchain

jobListings.title: CMS Developer
responsibilities: Build and maintain websites using CMS platforms (WordPress, Shopify, Drupal)
Customize themes, plugins, and templates
Optimize websites for speed, SEO, and performance
Ensure cross-browser and responsive compatibility
Troubleshoot CMS-related issues
skills: 2+ years of CMS development experience
Proficiency in PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Experience with databases (MySQL, MongoDB)
Knowledge of SEO and security best practices
bonus: Developed high-traffic CMS websites
Customized core CMS functionality
Worked on e-commerce and multi-language sites
expert: Capable of building fully customized CMS websites
Optimizes performance, security, and SEO end-to-end

jobListings.title: App Developer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement interactive interfaces
Integrate APIs and backend services
Ensure high performance, security, and responsiveness
Troubleshoot and optimize apps
skills: 2+ years of app development experience
Proficiency in Swift, Kotlin, Flutter, or React Native
Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices
Familiarity with app deployment processes
bonus: Built apps with authentication, payments, push notifications
Experience with cross-platform frameworks
Published apps with high user ratings
expert: Released apps on major platforms
Can design, develop, and maintain end-to-end mobile solutions

jobListings.title: UI/UX Designer
responsibilities: Design intuitive interfaces for web and mobile apps
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with developers to implement designs
Ensure brand consistency and accessibility
skills: 2+ years of UI/UX experience
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or similar tools
Strong understanding of design principles, typography, and color theory
Knowledge of responsive design
bonus: Experience with design systems and atomic design
Conducted extensive user testing and feedback analysis
Designed high-traffic apps or enterprise-level interfaces
expert: Creates high-impact, user-friendly applications
Converts wireframes to functional, optimized products

jobListings.title: Analytics & Conversion Specialist
responsibilities: Implement and manage tracking systems (GA4, GTM, Facebook Pixel, etc.)
Set up conversion goals, events, and attribution models
Analyze website/app performance and provide actionable insights
Troubleshoot tracking and data discrepancies
Monitor campaign performance and ROI
skills: 2+ years of analytics and tracking experience
Proficiency in Google Analytics, Tag Manager, and Ads Conversion Tracking
Knowledge of server-side tracking and API integrations
Strong analytical and reporting skills
bonus: Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)
Expertise in marketing attribution and multi-channel analytics
Experience in e-commerce or SaaS tracking
expert: Accurately measures KPIs and optimizes conversions
Implements end-to-end tracking solutions across platforms

jobListings.title: PPC / Google Ads Specialist
responsibilities: Create, manage, and optimize Google Ads campaigns
Conduct keyword research and competitor analysis
Track campaign performance and ROI
Prepare reports and recommendations for stakeholders
skills: 2+ years of Google Ads experience
Knowledge of bidding strategies, ad copywriting, and targeting
Proficiency in Google Ads, Analytics, and Tag Manager
bonus: Experience with display, search, video, and remarketing campaigns
Managed campaigns for e-commerce or large-scale clients
Conducted A/B testing for ads
expert: Achieves high CTR, ROI, and campaign performance
Optimizes campaigns across multiple industries

jobListings.title: Social Media Marketer
responsibilities: Plan and execute social media campaigns
Create engaging content and visuals
Monitor performance, analyze metrics, and adjust strategy
Manage social media ads and budgets
skills: 2+ years of social media marketing experience
Proficiency in social media platforms and analytics tools
Strong copywriting and creative skills
bonus: Experience with paid social campaigns and remarketing
Built viral content and grew organic reach
Managed multiple platforms for brands
expert: Delivers campaigns that increase engagement and conversions
Understands audience behavior and platform trends

jobListings.title: Graphic Designer
responsibilities: Design visual content for web, social media, and print
Create branding materials, infographics, and advertisements
Collaborate with marketing and product teams
Ensure visual consistency and brand adherence
skills: 2+ years of graphic design experience
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite
Strong understanding of typography, color, and composition
bonus: Experience in motion graphics and animation
Portfolio includes branding, digital, and print design
Created high-impact social media visuals
expert: Produces visually compelling designs that drive engagement
Meets brand and client requirements consistently

jobListings.title: Video Editor
responsibilities: Edit and produce videos for social media, ads, and presentations
Add visual effects, transitions, audio, and color grading
Collaborate with content and marketing teams
skills: 2+ years of video editing experience
Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects
Strong storytelling and visual composition skills
bonus: Experience in motion graphics or 2D/3D animation
Produced viral or marketing-focused content
Knowledge of different video formats and platforms
expert: Creates engaging videos that drive conversions
Works efficiently while maintaining high quality

jobListings.title: Cyber Security Analyst
responsibilities: Monitor and protect systems from cyber threats
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing
Implement security policies and access controls
Investigate security incidents and provide solutions
skills: 2+ years of cybersecurity experience
Knowledge of network security, firewalls, and encryption
Familiarity with penetration testing tools and standards (ISO, GDPR, NIST)
bonus: Experience with incident response and threat intelligence
Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) or CISSP certification
Implemented enterprise-level security solutions
expert: Protects systems proactively and effectively
Responds to threats and vulnerabilities efficiently

jobListings.title: SEO Specialist
responsibilities: Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and audits
Optimize on-page, off-page, and technical SEO
Build high-quality backlinks and monitor domain authority
Track performance and provide actionable insights
skills: 2+ years of SEO experience
Proficiency in SEMrush, Ahrefs, Google Search Console, Moz
Knowledge of content strategy, link building, and SERP analysis
bonus: Experience with local SEO and Google Business Profile
Knowledge of schema markup and structured data
Worked on high-traffic websites or e-commerce SEO
expert: Consistently improves organic rankings and website traffic
Strong understanding of search engine algorithms

jobListings.title: AI Automation Specialist
responsibilities: Design and develop AI agents for chatbots, business automation, or processes
Integrate AI tools with web and mobile platforms
Automate repetitive tasks and optimize AI agent performance
Collaborate with developers and business teams to define AI use-cases
skills: 2+ years of AI, automation, or ML experience
Proficiency in Python, Node.js, or similar languages
Experience with AI frameworks and APIs (OpenAI, LangChain, Hugging Face)
Knowledge of NLP, ML models, and data preprocessing
bonus: Built AI-powered chatbots or virtual assistants
Experience with serverless cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Knowledge of RPA tools and open-source contributions
expert: Creates AI agents that improve efficiency or user experience
Deep understanding of AI workflows and integration
